description: Emmanuel Macron swerves to avoid Donald Trump and embrace German chancellor Angela Merkel instead, in a video that has emerged of the apparent snub in Brussels.
title: Emmanuel Macron swerves past Donald Trump to embrace Angela Merkel

description: Donald Trump and France’s newly elected young President Emmanuel Macron, exchanged an awkward power handshake at their first face-to-face meeting in Brussels on Wednesday.
title: 'Their knuckles turned white': Donald Trump and Emmanuel Macron's awkward handshake

author: Justin Fox
description: Emmanuel Macron is poised to lead his country out of the economic wilderness.
title: The Elitist Experts May Just Save France

author: Charlie Spiering
description: President Donald Trump met with the newly elected French President Emmanuel Macron to discuss the shared goal of fighting terrorism.
title: Trump Meets with French President Macron to Discuss Terrorist Threat

author: Gregory Viscusi
description: Emmanuel Macron begins work on Tuesday on what may be one of the defining issues of his presidency: simplifying France’s labor code.
title: Macron Tackles French Labor Law in First Push to Fix Economy

description: France's president, Emmanuel Macron, appeared to deliberately swerve out of President Trump's path on May 25.
title: Analysis | Will ‘Trumpshakes’ make world leaders avoid his grip?

author: Ryan Bort
description: The alpha-president reasserts himself after a battle of handshakes with French President Emmanuel Macron.
title: Trump's right hand has had a rough week—now he used it to shove a NATO leader

author: Reuters
description: French President Emmanuel Macron pressed Europeans to strengthen the cooperation in security and sharing of intelligence after the deadly attack in Manchester on Monday night, as he arrived in Brussel
title: Macron initiates “protection agenda” for Europe post Manchester

author: By Chris Pleasance
description: President Trump said America stands with Britain following the terror attack in Manchester, joining Vladimir Putin, Emmanuel Macron, and Angela Merkel in condemning the atrocity.
title: President Donald Trump offers solidarity after Manchester bomb attack

author: Jennifer Jacobs, Margaret Talev, Craig Gordon
description: Donald Trump is known for employing knuckle-crushing, testosterone-driven, arm-shuddering handshakes. But he met his match today in Emmanuel Macron.
title: Macron Out-Trumps Trump in Handshake Duel Before NATO Summit
